name: ZombieRun (itch) (DyaDya)
description: You think nobody can die twice? I'll tell you that you're wrong. After human becomes zombie, if it dies, it will become zombie again! Want some proofs? You can see this in ZombieRun when you will bring zombie through some roofs. Don't let him fall, otherwise he becomes zombie again... Anyway there are some things that will help you prevent this. Wish you luck and get some brains at the finish!
